mailBody:
Dear [Client's Name],

I hope this message finds you well.

We are currently in the process of completing our due diligence for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC and have identified some missing information that we require to proceed further.

The following items from our checklist are still pending or missing:

1. Company Directorship: Specific details about the company's directorship are not provided.
2. Company PEP Screening: No information is provided regarding Politically Exposed Persons (PEP) screening.

Could you please provide us with the necessary information regarding these items at your earliest convenience? Your prompt response will help us ensure compliance and maintain the integrity of our processes.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Company]
[Your Contact Information]
